tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SQL_Injection_Attacks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text VARCHAR(255),
    attack_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Blocked_Queries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    blocked_query_text VARCHAR(255),
    block_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SQL_Analysis_Logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SQL_Injection_Detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query TEXT,
    is_attacked BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Blocked_Queries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_id INT,
    blocked_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE User_Queries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    query TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Query_Analysis_Logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analysis_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Attack_Patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name TEXT,
    example_query TEXT
)
